numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a difference between older generations and younger adults.
2. Younger adults mostly believe that the world is becoming a better place.
3. Older generations believe this less than younger adults believe this.
4. I wonder what contributed to this belief of younger generations.
5. I wonder whether this belief depends on the environment of the country where a person lives.
6. I am in the age range from 15 years to 24 years.
7. Therefore, this topic relates to me.
8. However, this topic does not relate to me much.
10. Economic issues in the world have gotten off track.
11. Social issues in the world have gotten off track.
12. The graph shows how different generations view the future of the world.
13. The younger generation is more optimistic about the future of the world than the older generation is.
14. The headline is: Optimism of the future between the generations.
